## QueryResultParser interface

SQL query (`SELECT` statement) result parser.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface QueryResultParser<R> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [addRow(row)](./db.queryresultparser.addrow.md) | Add result set row to the parser. |
|  [getResult()](./db.queryresultparser.getresult.md) | Get constructed query result object once all rows have been fed to the parser. |

## Remarks

A parser instance is passed into a query execution method and is fed with selected data row by row constructing the result object internally. Once the query execution is complete and all rows have been fed to the parser, the constructed query execution result object can be retrieved from the parser.

Errors thrown from the parser methods cause the query execution result promise being rejected with the thrown error.
